channel.title: [2 Questions] Server Messages - Squeal [Matrix Source]
channel.description:
Hey guys,
1. I've recently added money pouch to my source but i really want to add sof too, does someone have a guide for it?
2. Second, i want to add like random messages come up in the chatbox saying like News: Vote for cash
and some other lines..
Thanks, Impactz

He’s laughing because the Squeel file is ‘‘SoF.java’’

You coudl change it in player.java/world.java you dumbass, im not using a guide

Get out of here.
[/quote]

Don’t act stupid.[/quote]

Hahahaha, thanks.

item.title: [2 Questions] Server Messages - Squeal [Matrix Source]

item.description:
@Valazar wrote:

Anywhere really just make sure to call it, add it in client.java.

Make sure to add the missing variables.

Read full topic

item.title: [2 Questions] Server Messages - Squeal [Matrix Source]
item.dc:creator: @Impactz Impactz
item.description:
@Impactz wrote:

[quote=“Valazar, post:3, topic:459882”]Depending if you use events you can use this.

[code]public void autoMessage() {
	EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() {
		public void execute(EventContainer c) {
			if(Config.LAST_MESSAGE == 0) {
				sendMessage("[@blu@Server@bla@] Remember to ::vote @bla@for the server every day to help us grow.");
				Config.LAST_MESSAGE = 1;
			} else if(Config.LAST_MESSAGE == 1) {
				sendMessage("[@blu@Server@bla@] Donations are automated!");
				Config.LAST_MESSAGE = 2;
			}
	}, 300000);//the yell timer - 5 minutes
}[/code]

You should be able to add any missing variables.[/quote]

Where do i need to add this?

Read full topic

item.title: [2 Questions] Server Messages - Squeal [Matrix Source]
item.dc:creator: @Valazar Valazar
item.description:
@Valazar wrote:

Depending if you use events you can use this.

[code]public void autoMessage() {
	EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() {
		public void execute(EventContainer c) {
			if(Config.LAST_MESSAGE == 0) {
				sendMessage("[@blu@Server@bla@] Remember to ::vote @bla@for the server every day to help us grow.");
				Config.LAST_MESSAGE = 1;
			} else if(Config.LAST_MESSAGE == 1) {
				sendMessage("[@blu@Server@bla@] Donations are automated!");
				Config.LAST_MESSAGE = 2;
			}
	}, 300000);//the yell timer - 5 minutes
}[/code]

You should be able to add any missing variables.

Read full topic
